channel.title: Basic Help
channel.description: Okay so at first I started a server and coded it but i'll admit it was crappy. There wasn't any lag but the effects and animations were cruddy. A lot of the attack styles for the monsters were glitchy and it didn't have all of the weapons pre installed on the client. So what I am trying to ask is if anyone has a client or knows a client that has all of the weapons (claws, Godswords, Vesta, ect) all NPC's that have working animation and all the spec attacks work. btw it has to be a 317 and only the client please :) Post here if you have anything Make it a delta please

item.title: Basic Help
item.dc:creator: @no1toldme2 no1toldme2
item.description:
@no1toldme2 wrote:

I think I might have one but not with me…Look on server downloads for client, like silab or somthing.

Read full topic

item.description:
@macca4g wrote:

my client has godswords d claws barrelcrest anchor etc but the sc are crap animations and some of the models dont work… it has a few customs so if u want that you can go to www.ownerkid.moonfruit.com and download client from there
